ruling: - You can select the card you discarded for the cost of [[A Feather of the Phoenix]] to be the card returned to the top of your Deck. If you discarded [[Night Assailant]] or [[Makyura the Destructor]], then their effects will activate.
- You can select a Fusion Monster in the Graveyard for [[A Feather of the Phoenix]] but it is returned to the Fusion Deck.

- Discarding one card is a cost to activate this effect. Your opponent can chain [[Disappear]] to the activation of this card and remove the discarded card from play so that you cannot return it to the top of the Deck.
- This is an effect that targets.
